'''''tir-''''' is a [[Quenya]] verb meaning "watch, guard, heed".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''tir''</ref> Compare with the [[Sindarin]] noun ''[[tirith]]''.

==Examples==
* ''[[palantíri]]'' = "Watch Far and Wide" (colloquially translated as "Seeing-stones")
* ''[[Tirion]]'' = "watchtower"
